name: anewbeginning
description: A full-stack web application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install-all: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.setup-public: cd server && mkdir -p public && cp -r ../client/build/* public/
scripts.build: npm run install-all && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run setup-public
